definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Seventy per cent of out production team's income derives from agricultural produce.
sentences.chinese: 我们生产队收入的百分之七十来自农产品。

sentences.english: Home to more than younger son on third grade production to cook.
sentences.chinese: 家里子妹多就上到小学三年级回生产队做饭。

sentences.english: She then spent 10 years laboring in a rural production team.
sentences.chinese: 随后的10年里她在农村的一个生产队劳动。

sentences.english: These are not the only production teams that have overfulfilled the output quota.
sentences.chinese: 超产的不单是这几个生产队。

sentences.english: A sheep in the third production team is ill .
sentences.chinese: 第三生产队有一只羊病了。

sentences.english: Do you approve of her as the accountant for our production team?
sentences.chinese: 你们赞成她当我们生产队的会计吗？

sentences.english: The team leader made up a purchasing list.
sentences.chinese: 生产队长列出一张购货单。

sentences.english: She talked about interesting stories from her workpoint in the production team.
sentences.chinese: 她讲起了以前生产队记工分的趣闻。

sentences.english: He stole the pickaxe from the production team and was therefore criticized by the team leader.
sentences.chinese: 他偷了生产队的铁镐，遭到了队长的批评。

sentences.english: The third production team's high- yielding land abuts on the high-way.
sentences.chinese: 第三生产队那片高产田靠近公路。

definition: work point (measure of work completed in a rural commune in the PRC during the planned economy era)
to accumulate manure/to lay down compost
to thresh or husk grain on a threshing ground (dialect)
fixing of farm output quotas for each household
educated youth (sent to work in farms during the Cultural Revolution)
commune member (PRC, 1958-1985)/member of a society (or other organization)
